item.title: Haystack 图片存储系统
item.description: 主要核心是减少硬盘操作 After reducing directory sizes to hundreds of images per directory, the resulting system would still generally incur 3 disk operations to fetch an image: one to read the directory metadata into memory, a second to load the inode into memory, and a third to read the file contents.
